name: Snapshot MCP metadata
description: Log MCP call metadata to evidence.log (rotates at 1MB)

action.command: echo "$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) | MCP call completed" >> api/evidence.log && [ $(wc -c < api/evidence.log) -gt 1048576 ] && mv api/evidence.log api/evidence.log.$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) || true
